articles.title: Inter-Korean Military Working-level Talks Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Military Working-level Talks Held
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The north-south military working-level talks took place in Kaesong Tuesday.
					 At the talks Colonel of the Korean People's Army Ri Son Gwon, head of the delegation of the north side, stated as follows over the fact that the south side has recently driven inter-Korean relations to a catastrophic phase and obstructed military guarantee for passage, communications and customs clearance for revitalizing the Kaesong Industrial Zone while getting hell-bent on the unpardonable escalated confrontation with the DPRK:
					
					 Firstly, the situation in waters of the West Sea of Korea is reaching the brink of explosion due to the recent grave military provocations of the south side's military authorities in the waters.
					
					 The military authorities of the south side, who intentionally and directly organized the premeditated armed conflict in the said waters in November last year, staged a "citation ceremony" for those involved in it, inciting an atmosphere of confrontation. Then, they are gradually escalating the military tension in the controversial waters.
					
					 The south side authorities' foolish attempt to preserve the illegal "northern limit line" and make the existence of the "territorial waters" of the south side along it an established fact can never be overlooked.
					
					 Secondly, the psychological warfare designed to do harm to the dignified system of the DPRK and its security is going to extremes.
					
					 The campaign for scattering leaflets slandering the ideology and system in the DPRK has escalated into the depth of the north side, going beyond the areas along the Military Demarcation Line. And anti-DPRK psychological broadcasting is getting more vicious in its content and form than ever before.
					
					 And it is long since the moves for bringing down the system of the DPRK by spying on what is going on inside it and destabilizing it via the northern border areas have gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 The authorities of the south side should stop at once such a ridiculous and foolish act.
					
					 Thirdly, if the authorities of the south side finally stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in collusion with outside forces, the situation on the Korean Peninsula will be "uncontrollable."
					
					 The joint military exercises to be kicked off on March 8 are adventurous offensive operational exercises involving massive arms buildup, infiltration into rear areas, ground attack, coast landing and assault operation and nuclear war maneuvers for an actual war for the purpose of mounting a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK on the ground, in the sea and sky in "contingency" on the peninsula.
					
					 Now the south Korean authorities are getting hell-bent on the moves to do harm to the DPRK by intentionally escalating the military tensions for the purpose of inventing any pretext for conflict in the waters of the West Sea of Korea and, at the same time, tying to stage the large-scale DPRK-targeted war maneuvers in collusion with foreign forces while resorting to the unheard-of anti-DPRK psychological warfare. But this is a foolish act just as banging their heads on a rock and will negatively affect the development of inter-Korean relations and the revitalization of the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					
					 The head of the north side delegation charged that the ill-boding hostile moves of the south side are being pushed forward according to the carefully worked out scenario.
					
					 He solemnly clarified the resolute will and fixed stand of the army and people of the DPRK to mercilessly wipe out all hostile forces including anti-DPRK confrontation maniacs and traitors keen to stifle the DPRK politically and by force of arms.
					
					 Discussed at the talks were issues related to the implementation of "the agreement on military guarantee for passage, communications and customs clearance in the areas under the north-south control in the east and west sea regions" which was adopted according to the historic October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Bulgarian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Bulgarian President 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Georgi Parvanov, President of Bulgaria, on its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the President greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of Bulgaria and welfare of its people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Bulgarian PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Bulgarian PM 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Premier Kim Yong Il Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Boyko Borisov, Prime Minister of Bulgaria, on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations would grow stronger with each passing day.

articles.title: German Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
German Ambassador Hosts Reception 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Thomas Schafer, German ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Tuesday on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Germany.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairwoman of the Korea-Germany Friendship Association, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					 Staff members of the German embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Guinean PM Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Guinean PM Meets DPRK Ambassador
Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- I know well about the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the validity and vitality of the Songun politics in particular. I congratulate the Korean people on their great successes achieved recently under his leadership.
					 Jean Marie Dore, prime minister of the Government of National Unity of Guinea, said this when meeting the DPRK ambassador to Guinea who paid a courtesy call on him on Feb. 22.
					
					 The prime minister stressed that the Korean people are sure to emerge victorious in their drive to build a rich and powerful country under the tested leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 I am sure that the cause of Korean reunification will surely be accomplished by Kim Jong Il, he said, adding that Guinea greatly sets store by the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and would make positive efforts to boost these relations in the days ahead.

articles.title: Polish Film Show Held
articles.content:
Polish Film Show Held
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- A film show was held at the Taedongmun Cinema on Wednesday on the occasion of the 200th birth anniversary of Chopin, a famous musician of Poland.
					 It was attended by Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, officials concerned, working people in the city, Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Edward Pietrzyk and his embassy officials.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and officials of foreign embassies here.
					
					 The participants watched the Polish feature film "Chopin".

articles.title: Workshop for Handball Coaches Held
articles.content:
Workshop for Handball Coaches Held 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- An Olympic solidarity coaching course in handball took place in Pyongyang from February 21 to March 1. 
					 The workshop, divided into theoretical and practical courses at the Sports Science Library and Handball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street respectively, was attended by handball coaches of local sports groups and juvenile sports schools. 
					
					 It deals with such issues as making of training plans and physical and technical training method for handball players.
					
					 Mohamed Benkreira, a lecturer of the International Handball Federation, presided over the workshop.

articles.title: New Health Foodstuff Developed
articles.content:
New Health Foodstuff Developed
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Researchers of the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University have developed a new multi-functional health foodstuff.
					 They had paid attention to beans and oil-bearing flax for the purpose of making a functional health foodstuff of remedial value with natural active components of plants.
					
					 Having discovered that the crops contain some functional components useful for making a health foodstuff strong in anticancer effect and good in adaptability to estrogen, they had persevered in making experiments and research into the foodstuff.
					
					This foodstuff is especially efficacious for women of about the climacteric age and for prevention of such diseases as mastopathy and osteoporosis.
					
					 It is also good for protecting heart blood vessels through removal of cholesterol and neutral fat in blood and telangiectasia.

articles.title: Curved Type Strand-casting Machine Starts Operation
articles.content:
Curved Type Strand-casting Machine Starts Operation
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- A project of putting the curved type strand-casting process on modern lines was successfully completed at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 This has laid a solid foundation for drastically increasing steel production of the complex, further developing the metal industry of the country and contributing to the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 A commissioning ceremony took place on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, O Su Yong, vice-premier, officials concerned, officials and employees of the complex and builders of the Chongjin Metal Construction Complex.
					
					 At the ceremony a message of thanks of the Central Committee of the WPK was conveyed to the builders, designers, technicians and officials who performed labor feats in putting the said process on modern lines.
					
					 A report was followed by speeches there.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Discriminate Education Policy Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Discriminate Education Policy Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Japan should handle the issue of assistance to the Korean schools in Japan with seriousness and impartiality in order to prevent the situation from developing into extremity, Rodong Sinmun warns in a signed commentary on Wednesday.
					 Some days ago, the "minister in charge of abduction issue" of Japan asked the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology to exclude the Korean schools in Japan from the list of assistance for senior high schools, the commentary notes, and goes on:.
					
					 It is mean and dastardly demeanor of those steeped in hostility towards the DPRK and national chauvinism to the marrow of their bones to write off the Korean schools from the list of government assistance. 
					
					 The Korean schools in Japan should be accorded government assistance in view of the contents of a bill and the purport of the Japanese government's assistance for those schools.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' moves are tantamount to forcing heavy burden of tuition upon the Korean students in Japan. They are also reckless violation of national education little short of depriving the Korean students of their rights to learn and putting the existence of the schools of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) at peril. 
					
					 It is a wanton violation of international law for the Japanese authorities to take such discriminative and humiliating measure for the Korean students in Japan despite their lip-service for "equality" and "defense of human rights".
					
					 All the more nonsensical is the Japanese reactionaries' talk that they are not sure whether the state's spending of taxes for the Korean schools in Japan would be understandable to the Japanese. The Koreans in Japan are paying the same amount of taxes as the Japanese. Japan tried to collect from the Koreans in Japan even one more penny, much less exempting them from any tax item.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' persistent pursuance of the policy of discriminating and looking down upon Koreans despite the just demand of the Korean people and Chongryon would bring them more hatred from all people and stern judgment by history.
					
					 It is not beneficial for Japan to drive the DPRK-Japan relations into a crisis by pursuing the national discrimination policy.
					
					 We will closely watch the future behavior of Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Conscientious Educator Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Suppression of Conscientious Educator Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- A woman teacher of a primary school in Arakawa Ward of Tokyo asserted that there should be no war, when lecturing the pupils on the historical fact of the forced labor committed by the Imperial Japanese Army against the Koreans in the period of World War II. The Japan regional education authorities made themselves busy, investigating the case and sending official documents to other schools of the ward to draw their attention to the matter.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This signifies violation of justice and human conscience by injustice and an outright challenge to them. Japan self-exposed that it is a dictatorial state ruthlessly trampling down the human rights, not a democratic state.
					
					 What is more serious is that Japan's criminal scheme for a war of overseas aggression was brought to light this time.
					
					 It is an important political goal of the Japanese reactionaries to instill the militarist idea for overseas aggression into the new generations and hurl them to the war for conquering other nations. No wonder the contents and policies for education of the students are consistent with the "superiority" of the Yamato nation and war admiration in Japan and on this basis, the tragic stories of Japan's past crimes are largely concealed and history is grossly distorted.
					
					 The same is the case with the issue of Tok Islets. The Japanese reactionaries marked Tok Islets as "Takeshima" in the textbooks and assert that they are "territories of Japan". They are infusing into the students the idea that the islets originally belonged to Japan and that they should take back the islets occupied by others, in a bid to let the new generations plunge into the war for overseas aggression.
					
					 It is a crime to teach falsity to the new generations and implant wrong idea and spirit into them.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries and education authorities should immediately stop the criminal reckless act of deceiving students and teaching falsity to attain their criminal political purpose.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace against War Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace against War Called for
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- In order to defend the destiny of the Korean nation and realize the peaceful reunification of the country, it is necessary to wage staunch struggle against the moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad for aggression and war under the uplifted banner of peace against war.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday stresses this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Holding high the banner of peace against a war is a vital issue related to the destiny of the Koreans and the prospect of the cause of reunification. It also presents itself as the very urgent issue in improving the inter-Korean relations and promoting national reconciliation and cooperation at present.
					
					 The Korean nation has been exposed to the constant threat of a war for more than six decades by the ceaseless moves of the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces for an aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 Some time ago, the warlike forces of the U.S. and the south Korean military announced that they would stage dangerous Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, a blatant challenge to the aspiration and desire of all the Koreans for peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 All the Koreans should wage a nationwide dynamic struggle to frustrate their moves to escalate confrontation and launch a war, rallied close under the said banner in order to ease tension and ensure durable peace on the peninsula and improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The whole of south Korea should be alive with the mounting spirit for peace against war and loud voices for defence of peace should be heard from wherever Koreans live.
					
					 All the Koreans at home and abroad should bring about a decisive turn in the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the national reunification movement this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the liberation of Korea under the uplifted banner of peace against a war.

articles.title: Young People Called upon to Be Vanguard of Great Surge
articles.content:
Young People Called upon to Be Vanguard of Great Surge
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- All the young people should give full play to their wisdom and passion in the present great revolutionary surge and fully demonstrate their honor as matchless shock brigade and death-defying corps.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 When the young people become standard-bearers in the advance for a great surge and work hard with youthful vigor, their hearts afire, our country would leap higher and faster, translating the noble intention and desire of President Kim Il Sung into a brilliant reality. 
					
					 The Korean youth are loyal vanguard who devotedly defends the headquarters of the revolution in the van of the advance for a great surge, ranks of brave fighters who make breakthrough of advance on the most difficult and labor-consuming fronts in building an economic power and pace-setters and pioneers in pushing back the frontiers of science who powerfully demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea with great scientific and technological achievements. 
					
					 Let us devotedly defend the party and the leader with the shining victory of a great surge. This is the resolution of faith and firm determination of all the young people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The persevering executive ability to bring the idea and will of the leader into a brilliant reality and the fighting spirit to devotedly implement the tasks given by the party have become excellent ideological and moral traits of the young people in the era of a great surge. 
					
					 Today our young people are fully displaying their bravery in the advance for a great surge holding high the slogan of faith and struggle "When the Party Is Determined, We Can Do Anything!" 
					
					 Immensely bright is the future of our country as our intelligent young people take the lead in the drive to push back the frontiers of science and technology in the era of a great surge, the article concludes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by KFA Chairman
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by KFA Chairman
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) headquartered in Spain, said that he was deeply impressed to witness the reality of the DPRK where the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation is making dynamic progress under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					 Lauding Kim Jong Il as a peerless statesman victoriously leading the revolution and construction with his unique political mode, he said: It is thanks to his leadership that the DPRK is demonstrating its might as an invincible power boasting single-minded unity and a powerful military force.
					
					 Progressive mankind is highly praising Kim Jong Il as the most prominent political elder and a great master of leadership in the present times as he has made immortal contributions to world peace and independence with his Songun politics.
					
					 He stressed that socialist Korea will prosper forever as it is led by the great illustrious commander of Songun.
					
					 The KFA will conduct more energetic activities in support of the just cause of the Korean people in the future, too, he declared.

articles.title: Seminar for Remembering Korean Victims Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
Seminar for Remembering Korean Victims Held in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- An international seminar for remembering Korean victims was held in Tokyo under the sponsorship of the Tokyo Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans (Tokyo fact-finding group) on February 27, 65 years since U.S. forces' big air-raid on Tokyo.
					 Present there were members and researchers of the Tokyo fact-finding group and Japanese political figures and citizens. 
					
					 Akihiro Hatsushiga, member of the House of Representatives from the Democratic Party of Japan, said in his speech it was very regretful that the Japanese government has not yet got proper knowledge of the actual conditions of many Korean victims of the big air-raid on Tokyo. He expressed his will to make positive efforts to seek a solution to the issue by improving the Japan-DPRK relations in the future.
					
					 Ri Il Man, secretary general of the Korean side to the fact-finding group, noted in his keynote report that the probe into the actual conditions of the Korean victims of the big air-raid made by the U.S. forces on Tokyo in March of 1945, the closing period of the Second World War, is directly related to the issue of the Japanese government's settlement of the past crimes. He referred to the activities of the Tokyo fact-finding group, the background against which remains of the dead were unearthed and the situation that prevailed at that time when forcible drafting was perpetrated.
					
					 He urged the Japanese government to correctly confirm the identities of Korean victims, probe the truth about the issue of remains and take practical measures to make an apology and reparation to the victims and their bereaved families.
					
					 The seminar heard a report "Our Stand on Issue of Remains" sent by the Measure Committee for Former Korean "Comfort Women" for Imperial Japanese Army and Victims of Forcible Drafting. Then followed speeches by Singichi Arai, honorary professor at Ibaraki University, and Jong Hye Gyong, section chief of the south Korean Committee for Investigation into the Damage Done by the Japanese Imperialists' Forcible Mobilization during Their Occupation of Korea.
					
					 An appeal adopted at the seminar charged that more than 10,000 Koreans were killed during the big air-raid on Tokyo but the Japanese government and business groups which committed forcible drafting at that time are still evading the responsibility for the crime and refusing to make due apology and reparation for it.
					
					 The appeal called for boosting solidarity and ties with the progressive organizations this year marking the lapse of 100 years since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" to let an increasing number of people turn out as one in the movement to seek a solution to the issue. 
					
					 The seminar was followed by a memorial service.

articles.title: Book on Centenary of Kim Il Sung' s Birth Published in Syria
articles.content:
Book on Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth Published in Syria
Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- A publishing house of Syria published a book titled "DPRK Winning Victory after Victory and Hard Facts" dedicated to the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					The book authored by the director of the publishing house carries photos of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					It has preface and Chapter one A big harmonious family, Chapter two Blessed people, Chapter three Today and tomorrow and Chapter four the Country that has many friends.
					
					The author in the preface says visiting the DPRK several times he keenly realized that the DPRK is a popular country and an ideal one desired by humankind.
					
					In the chapter one the author cites historical facts and tells about revolutionary anecdotes to prove that the President and Kim Jong Il shaped line and policies as required and desired by the popular masses, always finding themselves among the people, and pursued benevolent politics.
					
					In the chapter two he praises the systems of free medical service and compulsory free education now in force in the DPRK as genuine popular policies. He expresses optimism about the rosy future of the DPRK as it is the first tax-free country in the world.
					
					In the chapter three the author wishes the Korean people victory in the future, noting that they have dynamically advanced toward a thriving nation full of conviction and optimism free from pessimism under the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					In the chapter four the author writes about the President's noble internationalism and the profound loving care shown by Kim Jong Il for many foreign figures.
					
					Introducing the Korean people's steadfast will to reunify the country in closing, the author stresses that the reunification of Korea should be surely achieved on the basis of the three charters for national reunification put forward by the President, expressing conviction that the Korean people would be sure to live in the reunified land.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Russia, Laos, Mexico and Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Russia, Laos, Mexico and Pakistan
Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Friendly meetings, photo exhibitions, film shows and art performances were held in Russia, Laos, Mexico and Pakistan from Feb. 10 to 13 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were photos on the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					  The first vice president of Far-Eastern State University for Communications in Khabarovsk of Russia extended best wishes to Kim Jong Il on his birthday on behalf of all teachers and students of the university, saying the joint performance provided another occasion of contributing to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association said that the Korean people would surely build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The principal of Ali Ali School in Karachi of Pakistan praised the Korean people for having turned their country into a politico-ideological and military power, single-mindedly rallied around Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Reply of Korea."
					
					 Put on the stages of the art performances were choruses "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", the immortal revolutionary hymns, and other colorful numbers.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Pakistan.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- One winter day in Juche 35 (1946) anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, who had felt unwell for days, took to her bed after seeing off President Kim Il Sung going to his office.
					 With her suffering from a high fever, an official sent for a doctor.
					
					 Sitting up in sickbed to receive the doctor, she scolded the official for having invited the doctor for her slight illness.
					
					 After attending to her, the doctor prescribed a complete rest for her with a high fever.
					
					 When the doctor left, she reproached the official again for having sent for a doctor very busy over medical treatment with the just liberated country short of doctors.
					
					 She then earnestly told him not to do such things as inviting a doctor again, indifferent to others' pain.

articles.title: Conversan en Kaesong expertos militares de Norte y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Conversan en Kaesong expertos militares de Norte y Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 2 en Kaesong las conversaciones entre los expertos militares de ambas partes coreanas.
					  En esta ocasion el primer coronel del Ejercito Popular de Corea Ri Son Gwon, jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se refirio a que en los ultimos dias la parte surcoreana lleva a la fase catastrofica las relaciones bilaterales recurriendo freneticamente a la imperdonable campana conflictiva con la RPDC y crea obstaculos tambien a la garantia militar del transito, las comunicaciones y la admision de la aduana para dinamizar la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y senalo como lo siguiente:
					
					  Primero, ultimamente, debido a las graves maniobras de provocacion militar de las autoridades militares surcoreanas en el Mar Oeste de Corea, la situacion de esta zona maritima llega al borde de explosion.
					
					  Las autoridades militares surcoreanas, que habian organizado y comandado de manera intencional y directa el premeditado conflicto armado ocurrido en noviembre del ano pasado en el Mar Oeste, fomentaron el ambiente de enfrentamiento realizando hasta el "acto de condecoracion" a los participantes en ese caso y propician la escalada de tension militar en ella.
					
					  No sera tolerado en absoluto el absurdo intento de las autoridades surcoreanas de mantener la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte" y hacer creer como hecho consumado que dicha zona maritima esta bajo su jurisdiccion. 
					
					  Segundo, llegan al extremo los complots psicologicos contra la RPDC para danar el muy digno sistema y seguridad de ella.
					
					  Ahora, el lanzamiento de volantes encaminado a calumniar la idea y el regimen de la RPDC se expande a la profundidad del interior de ella desde los alrededores de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					  Entre tanto, la radioemision, que forma parte de la guerra psicologica contra la RPDC, se torna mas siniestra que antes tanto en su contenido como en su forma.
					
					  Ademas, ya hace mucho tiempo que sobrepasaron el limite de peligro las maniobras para espiar y desestabilizar el interior de la RPDC por via de la zona fronteriza septentrional. 
					
					La parte surcoreana debe cesar de inmediato los intentos ridiculos e inutiles que nunca seran realizados. 
					
					Tercero, si las autoridades surcoreanas despliegan por fin los ejercicios "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana caera en la fase "incontrolable".
					
					Los simulacros "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", que se desarrollaran a partir del 8 de marzo que viene, devienen aventureros ejercicios de la operacion ofensiva que incluyen el refuerzo de los efectivos en gran medida, la penetracion a la retaguardia, el ataque terrestre, el desembarco y el intenso ataque aereo en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ademas, resultan maniobras de guerra nuclear para atacar preventiva y sorpresivamente a la RPDC en la tierra, el mar y el cielo. 
					
					Ahora las autoridades surcoreanas agravan intencionalmente la tension militar con el fin de preparar la chispa de conflicto en el Mar Oeste de Corea, y al mismo tiempo, desarrollan los ejercicios de guerra de agresion al Norte de gran envergadura, en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, recurriendo a las intrigas psicologicas anti-RPDC sin precedentes, y se desesperan por atacar atrevidamente a nuestra parte. Pero, esto es un acto igual que tratar de romper una pena viva a cabezazos y ejerce la influencia negativa al desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur y a la gestion activa de la ZIK. 
					
					Al denunciar y condenar categoricamente el hecho de que tales insolitas acciones hostiles de la parte Sur se impulsan segun el plan esmeradamente trazado, el jefe de la delegacion de nuestra parte expuso solemnemente la resuelta voluntad y la invariable posicion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de exterminar implacablemente a todas las fuerzas hostiles, inclusive los maniacos de confrontacion con la RPDC y los traidores a la nacion, que pretenden atropellar a esta en lo politico y militar.
					
					En esta ocasion hubo debates de los problemas relacionados con la ejecucion del "Acuerdo sobre la garantia militar del transito, las comunicaciones y la admision de la aduana en el area administrada por el Norte y el Sur en las zonas litorales del Este y Oeste", aprobado segun la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.

articles.title: RPDC prosperara eternamente, subraya presidente de la AAC
articles.content:
RPDC prosperara eternamente, subraya presidente de la AA
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ATCC) -- El presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad con Corea que tiene su sede en Espana, Alejandro Cao de Benos, dijo que quedo muy conmovido al presenciar la realidad de Corea en que se acelera con dinamismo la construccion de una gran potencia prospera bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					  Apunto que el Dirigente es politico extraordinario quien conduce a la victoria la revolucion y la construccion con el modo politico original y subrayo que bajo su sabia direccion la RPDC exalta un aspecto majestuoso como potencia invencible con la fuerza de la unidad monolitica y el potente poderio militar.
					
					  Prosiguio que la humanidad progresista elogia calurosamente al Dirigente, quien hace un gran aporte a la paz y la causa de la independencia del mundo practicando la politica de Songun, como veterano politico mas destacado de la epoca actual y gran maestro en la direccion.
					
					 Destaco que bajo la direccion del gran comandante insigne del Songun, la Corea socialista prosperara infinitamente.
					
					  Destaco que tambien en el futuro su entidad desarrollara con mas vigor las actividades de solidaridad con la justa causa del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a los reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a los reaccionarios japoneses 
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ATCC) -- Japon debe tratar con seriedad e imparcialidad el problema de asistencia a las escuelas de coreanos residentes en Japon para que la situacion no cayera en el estado extremista.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 3 y continua:
					
					  Hace poco, el "ministro encargado del problema de secuestro" de Japon pidio al ministro de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia excluir dichas escuelas de la lista de los objetos de asistencia del gobierno a las escuelas superiores.
					
					  Este intento deviene un vil acto de quienes estan presos plenamente de la conciencia hostil a Corea y el chovinismo nacional.
					
					  Tanto a la luz del contenido del proyecto de ley como en vista del proposito de asistencia del gobierno japones a las escuelas superiores, las escuelas de coreanos residentes en Japon devienen debidamente el objeto de asistencia del gobierno.
					
					  Tales maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses resultan el imprudente acto de represion a la educacion nacional encaminado a forzar el pesado cargo de gastos para estudios a los alumnos coreanos residentes en Japon y arrebatarles el derecho de estudio y, a la larga, poner en peligro la misma existencia de las escuelas de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
					
					  Las autoridades japonesas, que hablan ruidosamente de la "igualdad" y la "proteccion de los derechos humanos", pretenden tomar la medida discriminante y despectiva a los estudiantes coreanos que viven en Japon, lo cual sera un acto de flagrante violacion al derecho internacional.
					
					  Si los reaccionarios japoneses siguen recurriendo a la politica de discriminacion y desprecio nacionales negando por fin la justa demanda del pueblo coreano y la Chongryon, no podran evitar el odio de todo el mundo y la severa sentencia de la historia.
					
					  Tampoco sera util para Japon el acto de llevar a la crisis las relaciones con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mediante la politica de discriminacion nacional. 
					
					Observaremos el acto ulterior de Japon.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica represion en Japon a una maestra progresista
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica represion en Japon a una maestra progresista 
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ATCC) -- Una maestra de una escuela primaria del municipio de Arakawa de la metropoli de Tokio enfatizo que "no debe haber la guerra" cuando daba a conocer a los alumnos los hechos historicos sobre el crimen de trabajos forzados impuestos por el viejo ejercito japones a los coreanos durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					Las autoridades locales de educacion de Japon armaron escandalos por ese caso abriendo una investigacion y enviando el documento oficial para llamar la atencion a otras escuelas en el citado municipio.
					
					  En un comentario individual de este miercoles, el periodico Minju Joson lo califico de represion injusta y desafio frontal a la justicia y la conciencia de la humanidad y critico que Japon mostro por si solo que no es un Estado democratico sino el dictatorial que viola flagrantemente los derechos humanos.
					
					  Lo mas grave del caso es que esta vez quedo evidenciada la intencion de Japon de provocar la criminal guerra de agresion a ultramar, apunto el comentarista y continuo:
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses toman por su importante meta politica infundir en las nuevas generaciones la idea militarista de agresion a ultramar y lanzarlas de nuevo a la guerra de conquista de otras naciones. Por eso, en la sociedad japonesa la politica y el contenido de educacion para los alumnos estan penetrados de alabanza a la "superioridad" de la nacion Yamato y a la guerra. En este curso, han sido ocultados en gran parte los episodios de los crimenes del pasado de Japon y quedo tergiversada seriamente la historia. 
					
					  En cuanto al problema del islote Tok, los reaccionarios japoneses lo anotaron como "Takeshima" insistiendo en que es un "territorio japones". De esta manera, tratan que lanzar a las nuevas generaciones a la guerra de agresion a ultramar inculcandoles la idea de recuperar ese islote que al decir de ellos, esta ocupado ahora por otros. 
					
					  Es un crimen meter embustes a las nuevas generaciones e inculcarles la idea y el espiritu erroneos.
					
					  Los reaccionarios y las autoridades docentes japoneses deben parar ahora mismo esa locura en que incurren para alcanzar sus criminales metas politicas.

articles.title: Simposio internacional en memoria de victimas coreanas
articles.content:
Simposio internacional en memoria de victimas coreanas
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ATCC) -- Con motivo de cumplirse 65 anos desde cuando las tropas norteamericanas perpetraron el gran ataque aereo a Tokio, tuvo lugar el 27 de febrero en esta capital japonesa el simposio internacional en memoria de las victimas coreanas bajo el auspicio del Grupo de Tokio para Investigar el Verdadero Aspecto del Reclutamiento Forzoso a los Coreanos (Grupo de averiguacion de Tokio).
					En la ocasion participaron los miembros y los investigadores de dicho Grupo, las personalidades del circulo politico y otros ciudadanos japoneses.
					
					El diputado del Partido Democratico de Japon Akihiro Hatsushiga expreso su lastima de que el gobierno japones no averiguo correctamente todavia el estado real de los coreanos que habian muerto por ese ataque aereo y anadio que se esforzara en el futuro por desarrollar las relaciones Japon-Corea y solucionar este problema.
					
					Ri Il Man, secretario de la parte coreana del mencionado Grupo, en su informe de base, dijo que la investigacion del estado real de los coreanos muertos por ese ataque aereo de las tropas norteamericanas cometido en marzo de 1945, epoca final de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, esta relacionada directamente con el problema de la liquidacion del pasado criminal del gobierno japones e hizo mencion del proceso de las actividades del Grupo, el decurso de haber descubierto la existencia de los restos mortales y la situacion de aquel tiempo en que se habia perpetrado el reclutamiento forzoso a los coreanos.
					
					El gobierno nipon tiene que verificar correctamente las identidades de los coreanos muertos, esclarecer la verdad referente al problema de restos mortales y tomar las medidas practicas para pedir disculpa e indemnizar a las victimas y sus familiares, insistio el orador.
					
					En el simposio se presento el informe "Nuestra posicion sobre los problemas de restos mortales", enviado por el Comite Coreano de Medidas para las ex "Consoladoras" para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso, e intervinieron el profesor honorario de la Universidad Ibaraki de Japon, Singichi Arai y la jefa de Seccion del Comite Surcoreano de Averiguacion del Verdadero Aspecto de Danos por la Movilizacion Forzosa bajo la ocupacion del imperialismo japones, Jong Hye Gyong.
					
					El llamamiento aprobado en el simposio condena el hecho de que el gobierno japones y las empresas, que cometieron el reclutamiento forzoso en aquel tiempo, no hacen todavia la disculpa e indemnizacion debidas evitando sus responsabilidades pese a que habian muerto mas de 10 mil coreanos debido al gran ataque aereo a Tokio.
					
					El documento exhorta a fortalecer aun mas la solidaridad y lazos con las entidades progresistas en este ano del centenario de la manipulacion del "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon" y a levantarse numerosos hombres como un solo hombre en la lucha por la solucion del problema.
					
					Al cabo del simposio se efectuo un acto de recordacion a los coreanos muertos.
